params._amount: The amount of collateral tokens to deposit

returns._unlockedBalance: The amount that user can transfer or withdraw

params._amount: The amount of collateral to withdraw
params._to: The account that will receive withdrawn collateral

DepositTokenActiveUpdated(bool,bool).notice: Emitted when active flag is updated

MaxTotalSupplyUpdated(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when max total supply is updated

MinDepositTimeUpdated(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when minimum deposit time is updated

collateralizationRatio().notice: Collaterization ration for the deposit token

deposit(uint256,address).notice: Deposit colleteral and mint vsdTOKEN (tokenized deposit position)

isActive().notice: If a collateral isn't active, it disables minting new tokens

lastDepositOf(address).notice: Stores de timestamp of last deposit event of each account. It's used combined with `minDepositTime`.

minDepositTime().notice: The min amount of time that an account should wait after deposit collateral before be able to withdraw

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mint deposit token when an account deposits collateral

unlockedBalanceOf(address).notice: Get the unlocked balance (i.e. transfarable, withdrawable)
